prompts: Show me a legendary Pokemon with majestic wings and a serene expression.
Create a mythical creature that embodies the power of the ocean and sky.
Generate a Pokemon that has a sleek, aerodynamic body and a calming presence.
Design a flying-type Pokemon with white feathers and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a creature that can control the weather with its graceful flight.
Make a Pokemon that symbolizes tranquility and strength, soaring through the skies.
Give me a majestic water and flying type with a strong connection to the sea.
